text_block_list.text:
Bubblyland is an eccentric pool resort<n>themed around the
fun atmosphere of<n>Japan's late '80s bubble era.

Here, everyone liberates themselves<n>in their desire to
experience the<n>passion and brilliance of the good ol'<n>days
and a taste of the extraordinary.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
There's podiums to dance on,<n>tiramisu and nata de coco at
the cafe,<n>mochi by the pool, and a giant<n>waterslide to
enjoy!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You can rent retro clothes over<n>there?! Awesome!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Wow! Look at those cars! Their<n>bodies are set so low to the
ground!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: No, hang on! This isn't a training<n>facility at all!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Gasp! Wait... Don't tell me youtricked me into coming here?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you! There's no way I would do<n>such a thing to my cute
little junior!<n>It's true that this place can help turn<n>your bad
vibes into good ones!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Just let yourself get carried away by<n>the party fever, and
you'll understand<n>soon enough! Anyway, let's change<n>
into our swimsuits!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Whoa! W-wait a second!
Meanwhile, on Daiwa Scarlet's side<n>of things...

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Uuuugh! Where's all the magic?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Calm down a little! Ugh, how did I<n>even get dragged into
this?!
For some reason, she ended up at<n>Bubblyland too.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Okay, I'll do two laps around the trackthis morning... No, I'll do four! I don'tcare what it takes—I will get backto normal by this weekend!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huh? Isn't that...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Spe and Tickezo, you two'd better<n>hold on tight! You're
gonna<n>experience the most amazing magic<n>at Bubblyland!

text_block_list.name: Spe and Ticket
text_block_list.text: Okaaay!
Vrooom...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Bubblyland... Oh, that's the place<n>Maruzen invited me to
yesterday. I<n>hope Spe can get some good training<n>in
there...

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Magic?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Eek!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text:
Did she say magic?! I just heard<n>something about the most
amazing<n>magic! They all looked so excited, it's<n>got to be
magic!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: She did say that, but it's just a—

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to that Bubbly<n>whatchamacallit place too! No one
can<n>stop me!
Sweep Tosho runs as fast as she can<n>after the rental car.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Wait, is she seriously planning onrunning there?! You've got to bekidding!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
(Oh my gosh, she's running at full<n>tilt... Wait, does she even
know how to<n>get to that place? If she loses sight of<n>the
car, she'll be completely lost...)

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Uuugh! Hang on, Sweep! Wait up!

One thing leads to another, and Daiwa<n>Scarlet ends up
chasing Sweep Tosho<n>all the way to Bubblyland.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Sigh... I never expected we'dhave to go over three mountains. Thatwas more intense than any training session! ...But that's not important!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Sweep. Listen to me carefully.<n>The whole "magical
land" thing was<n>just a metaphor. Magic doesn't<n>really
exist.

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: It does too! My grandma's able to<n>use it!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: N-no, that's not what I—

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text:
There's definitely magic here! If you<n>don't believe me, then
I'll just have<n>to find it and prove you wrooong!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Aah! Wait! Aw, I was planning to take<n>her straight home
once I caught up to<n>her!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
(Maybe I should just leave, and—no, I<n>can't! An honor
student can't just<n>abandon someone who chased after<n>a
car all this way!)

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Siiigh... Ugh, come on!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: This is ridiculous! I have to hurry back<n>and train!
